messages: 3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:25): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: yeah, that spec hasn't been maintained very closely
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:26): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: I think some of that's been covered in emails from Murakami and someone else
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:26): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: http://lists.w3.org/Archives/Public/www-style/2009Feb/0252.html
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:27): 3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d: Yeah, I've found that one. Thank you anyway.
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:27): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: http://lists.w3.org/Archives/Public/www-style/2010Feb/0153.html
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:27): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: If there's anything not covered by those emails, please send to www-style...

3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:28): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: and if you're up for writing a patch against http://dev.w3.org/csswg/css3-lists/Overview.src.html I'd be happy to check it in :)
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:29): 3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d: Oh yeah, I thought the problem was we are lacking an active editor. :)
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:29): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: right, but I do have write access to that module :)
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:29): I am trying to find one from the community of Chinese speakers.
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:29): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: Cool.
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:30): Oh, I should introduce myself. Cause I think I might meet you soon.
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:30): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: ohyeah?
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:30): My name is KangHao Lu, a Taiwaese, just call me Kenny.
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:30): I am now a W3C intern and I might work for the Japanese Layout Task Force in the future.
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:30): nice
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:30): I have heard of your name a thousand times. :)
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:31): I'm flattered =)
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:31): SO... you are now in Japan right?
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:31): not yet
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:31): in 2 weeks
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:31): you're in Japan or Taiwan?
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:31): Oh, OK. I think Murata-san and I will bug you once you come here.
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:31): Japan, Keio.
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:31): Nice.
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:32): looks that up on a map
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:32): Oh, it's W3C/Keio, Fujisawa

aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:34): 3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d: I think Murata-san and I might visit Japan Microsoft to see if they have people who are interested in one of css3-text css3-text-layout css3-lists css3-ruby.
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:35): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: It'd be great to get comments and suggestions on the drafts
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:36): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: but for editors, we really need people who understand how CSS works
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:36): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: That's one of the great things about Murakami-san --
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:36): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: He understands all the requirements and what the results should be
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:36): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: but he also understands how CSS works and how to fit that into the CSS model
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:36): 3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d: Yes, true. But I am afraid he might be too busy from this moment on.
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:37): ... you don't think people from the IE team would understand CSS?
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:37): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: That's probably the best place to look. :)
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:38): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: Thing is, those drafts have had editors who didn't understand CSS.
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:38): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: well, not css3-lists so much
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:38): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: but Ruby and Text
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:38): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: I've had to rip apart Text and put it back together because of that
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:39): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: and for Ruby, I suspect the requirements are adequately handled by the spec at this point (I may be wrong)
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:39): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: but the definition of how it actually works is lacking
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:39): I'll ask Richard. :)
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:39): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: Ishida's already volunteered :)
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:39): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: He's just crazy busy afaict
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:40): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: If you can at least get him to figure out which features we need to strip to get to CR...
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:41): 3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d: Yeah, I am a Taiwnese. I might be able to do the bopomofo part.

aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:42): 3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d: Anyway, see you around when you come here. Murata-san is pushing vertical text very actively and I hope we could have some nice results.
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:42): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: Well, feel free to send comments to www-style
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:42): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: If you tag them with [css3-ruby], whoever's editing next will be able to find them.
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:42): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: If not... less luck there!
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:43): No problem, I know this part!
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:43): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: Cool.

3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:43): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: I'm serious about the patch to css3-lists, btw. If you just send me a diff of the changes -- or even just edit them into a copy of the Overview.src.html file and send that to me
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:43): 3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d: once again, patches are good enough right?
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:44): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: I can just check them in
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:44): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: Also...
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:44): I think I can ask our Chinese folks to work on that.
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:44): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: If you can find me some documentation on line breaking rules in Chinese...
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:44): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: Last time I was working on CSS3 Text, that was one area I was really stuck
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:44): Sure thing. :) Will try.
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:45): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: Even asked at the National Library of China in Bejing. No luck.
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:45): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: The librarian told me it's all trade secrets
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:45): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: And the kind of documentation I was looking for didn't exist
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:45): must be some misunderstanding, I suppose.
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:45): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: Contrast with Japan! They published the whole thing as JIS X 4051.
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:46): In Taiwan, those kinds of documentation would fall under the misnistry of education.
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:46): I think I would be able to find them. But maybe China ones are better. Anyway, we'll make this effort.
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:46): cool
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:47): I just want something to point people at...
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:47): and a few examples to illustrate why they should go read it. :)

aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (09:47): 3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d: FYI, we made this http://lists.w3.org/Archives/Public/public-html-ig-zh/ and I personally hope we can do some real job but not just discussing.
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (09:47): ... and making sure we have the right controls in CSS

171db427cee236fc04af9e5de94e7c39 (10:00): aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690: I'm kinda the active editor of Lists at the moment, and would be greatly interested in a correction to the cjk numbering systems.
171db427cee236fc04af9e5de94e7c39 (10:00): "active"
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (10:01): TabAtkins: did you incorporate the changes from the attachment of http://lists.w3.org/Archives/Public/www-style/2010Feb/0153.html already?
171db427cee236fc04af9e5de94e7c39 (10:01): No, not yet.
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (10:01): is looking at it
171db427cee236fc04af9e5de94e7c39 (10:01): puts it on his list to do this week.
aad758927f12b95b0cd1961f8dbee690 (10:02): Wow, cool. We'll do a check to see if there are further errors.
171db427cee236fc04af9e5de94e7c39 (10:04): Cool.
171db427cee236fc04af9e5de94e7c39 (10:09): 3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d: You need some sleep.  ^_^
